title: ApulSoft apTrigga3 v3.1.0-UNION [deepstatus]
description:
ApulSoft apTrigga3 v3.1.0-UNION [deepstatus]
------------------------------------------------------

URL.......: http://www.apulsoft.ch/aptrigga3/

Audio sample trigger plugin. Drag'n drop samples and trigger them with your audio. Spice up your drums loops and recordings.

Main Features
Plugin formats: AAX/AudioUnits/VST/VST3 for 32-bit and 64 bit hosts on Mac OS X and Windows
Trigger samples by analyzing the input signal.
ZERO samples trigger latency.
Trigger signal & event graph with dynamics settings on top.
Unlimited number of samples per preset that can be organized and grouped by drag & drop.
Input filter section with unlimited filter bands, frequency analyzer and filter graphs.
Samples can be recorded from the audio input.
The sample editor supports cropping and adjusting fade times.
Supports HiDPI (Retina) displays with HiDPI hosts.
The triggered samples can be modulated by level, by pitch and by 4-pole filters.
Built-in system-wide preset management with import and export of preset files with all samples included, compatible across platforms and hosts.

â€¢ Version 3.1.0
â€“ Input filter bands with adjustable order (slope steepness/shape definition).
â€“ Improved signal hold-time processing with better performance for small audio buffer sizes.
â€“ Customizable description text for presets + descriptions added for factory presets.
â€“ Adjustable random pitch generator for each trigger event.
â€“ The phase of each sample can be flipped.
â€“ The sample editor can switch between ms and samples units.
â€“ The panorama knob in the sample editor get disabled for mono instances of the plugin.
â€“ Added an entry to the preset menu â€Make Preset Portable..â€ to merge some base settings with the Init preset.
â€“ Support for VST3 host bypass button.
â€“ Previous/next preset in folder buttons added.
â€“ Minor GUI pixel tweaks such as smaller close button graphics and overlay colors.
â€“ BUGFIX: crash when closing the plugin GUI with the filter band creation popup open.
â€“ BUGFIX: crash when using the sample preview playback in a file chooser dialog.




System Requirements
windows machine running Windows XP or newer. Supports 32-bit & 64-bit OS.
A host application that supports, AudioUnits, VST or VST3 plugins running in 32-bit or 64-bit mode


[INSTALLATION]

Unrar

â€¢ Thats it! Done.
